hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{3} \text{ lions}\\
+& \underline{\blue{?} \text{ monkeys}}\\
=&\pink{18} \text{ new animals}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{18} \text{ new animals}\\
-& \underline{\green{3} \text{ lions}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ monkeys}\end{align}$

question.content:
The zoo got $18$ new animals. $3$ of them are lions and the rest are monkeys.

**How many new monkeys did the zoo get? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] monkeys
